Token.Abstract: Shows UIAlertView, which contains an UITextView for redeem code enter.
Check if a code is valid. If DEBUG flag is set, then also prints out the information about code validity.

Parameter.Name: redeemCode
Parameter.Abstract: The redeem code you want to validate.

Token.Abstract: This method redeems the provided code on the server and returns back the answer.

Parameter.Name: redeemCode
Parameter.Abstract: The redeem code you want to redeem.
